description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Job Responsibilities:
              

              General Admin (GA):
              

              o	Handle general office administrative works, such as office supplies, equipment and facilities’ repair & maintenance works, arrange and monitor cleaning service, insurance arrangement, management of office environment
              
              o	Responsible for all Premises Leasehold Management, fit out and maintenance works which includes office, service station, distribution hub and warehouse etc.
              
              o	Responsible for all procurement management works includes Centralized Procurement from HQ as well as local purchase within the country; such as operating materials and uniform, operating equipment, assets, office assets, office suppliers, travel ticket, accommodation arrangement, stationaries, etc.
              
              o	Responsible for inventory management of operating materials; includes the process of collecting the request, ordering, delivery, inspection, inventory control and maintain a safety stock level etc.
              
              o	Responsible of assets management for all assets within the country
              
              o	Facilitate and implement the administrative policies and procedures issued by HQ and revert comments on the policies and procedures for enhancement when necessary
              
              o	Prepare and submit administrative related reports
              
              o	Perform any other duties required from time to time
              

              Human Resources (HR)
              

              Assist in all human resources general activities;
              

              o	Administer HR policies & procedures for recruitment, training, employee relations, staff activities, staff exit arrangement
              
              o	Recruit employees at junior level; prepare interview for senior level recruitment
              
              o	Responsible for monthlyregular report to DOLISA & PIT
              
              o	Leave administration and HR reports
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              o	University graduate in relevant HR Management
              
              o	Minimum 2 years’ working experience in HR generalist
              
              o	Previous experience in HR and administration
              
              o	Proven ability to produce high quality analysis reports
              
              o	Flexibility, highly organized and able to handle multi-tasks
              
              o	Excellent interpersonal, communication and problem solving skills
              
              o	Good command of both spoken and written English
              
              o	Good team player, strong sense of responsibility and able to work under pressure
              
              o	Knowledge of Microsoft office programs such as Excel, Word, PowerPoint and HR systems
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
